channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Google Gemini : quotas séparés pour Pro et Raisonnement, voici les limites détaillées
item.description: Google revoit totalement sa gestion des quotas pour Gemini. Fini le pot commun, place à des limites séparées pour le raisonnement et le code, avec un avantage massif pour les abonnés Ultra.

item.title: X is down for the second time this week
item.description: Elon Musk's X, formerly Twitter, is down for the second time this week. Nearly 80,000 reports have spiked on Down Detector since around 10am ET Friday morning.

item.title: Amazon lance une myriade d’offres durant les soldes : les 18 meilleures offres
item.description: Pendant les soldes d’hiver, Amazon ne réserve pas ses bonnes affaires aux seuls membres Prime : chacun peut profiter d’une large sélection de remises. Pour le week-end de la deuxième démarque, le géant américain multiplie les offres et met en avant de nombreuses promotions à saisir sans attendre.

item.title: Frustrated with Verizon? These are the best deals for switching to AT&T and T-Mobile
item.description: Both T-Mobile and AT&T have tempting switching offers for new customers this week.

item.title: Capcom’s 12-minute showcase proves Resident Evil Requiem is worth the wait: here are my five key takeaways
item.description: After watching the Resident Evil Requiem showcase, launch day can't come soon enough, as the reveals have left me antsy.

item.title: 'We're competitive – we want to win': Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos rejects rumors that Warner Bros. movies won't stay in theaters for 45 days if $82bn buyout is approved
item.description: Netflix's co-chief has clarified its stance on the theatre going experience amid its potential buyout of Warner Bros.

item.title: Cisco has finally patched a maximum-level security issue which was allegedly being targeted by Chinese hackers
item.description: A maximum-severity Cisco bug was being exploited by multiple Chinese actors, reports said, forcing the firm to act.

item.title: This retro portable music player idea that 'recreates the image of a tape spinning on a circular shelf' has completely hooked me — I'd love someone to make it for real
item.description: This brilliant Bluetooth concept looks like something from ’70s sci-fi

item.title: Chinese EVs inch closer to the US as Canada slashes tariffs
item.description: The country is dropping its import tax from 100% to just 6.1%, with an initial annual cap of 49,000 cars.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X Suffers Widespread Outage
item.description: Here comes another influx of refugees to competing sites like Threads and Bluesky.

item.title: Lego’s Next ‘Legend of Zelda’ Set Takes Us Back to ‘Ocarina of Time’
item.description: Link and Zelda face off against Ganon in Lego's recreation of the iconic N64 game's climactic boss battle.

item.title: Former USDS Leaders Launch Tech Reform Project to Fix What DOGE Broke
item.description: The plan, which is still in its early stages, is spearheaded by former USDS administrator Mikey Dickerson.

item.title: What’s on the cards for Arc Raiders in 2026? According to the game’s design lead there’s going to be a roadmap shared soon as well as multiple new maps throughout the year
item.description: Arc Raiders design lead Virgil Watkins has teased some of what's in store for 2026. The game will be getting multiple maps this year.

item.title: Apple n’est plus prioritaire sur les puces de ses iPhone, la faute à Nvidia
item.description: TSMC a retiré le tapis rouge sous les pieds d'Apple. La firme à la pomme doit faire de la place à d'autres clients du fondeur, en particulier Nvidia. Un changement considérable dans la relation entre Apple et TSMC.

item.title: Forget the RAM crisis – are we headed for a full-blown GPU crisis? Rumored production cut for Nvidia GPUs makes it seem more likely
item.description: Nvidia won't have any new GPUs for 2026, rumor claims – and with an up to 20% drop in production, this year could be a troubled one.

item.title: YouTube relaxes monetization guidelines for some controversial topics
item.description: These controversial topics include self-harm, abortion, suicide, and domestic and sexual abuse.

item.title: X is down for some – here's everything we know about the outage
item.description: X is down for many users right now –here's everything we know about the latest outage.

item.title: Bluesky rolls out cashtags and LIVE badges amid a boost in app installs
item.description: Bluesky adds new features to its app amid a boost in installs due to the deepfake drama on X.

item.title: How to claim Verizon's $20 credit for Wednesday's service outage
item.description: Verizon is offering a very small mea culpa after Wednesday's massive outage, which drew more than 1.5 million reports on Downdetector and lasted hours. Initially, the carrier posted on X that it will offer a $20 credit, but customers must redeem it in the myVerizon app. The company then said the credit could be claimed though customer service (via phone or chat), but our editors’ attempts to do so via chat were met with a message to wait for a text with further instructions. Engadget editors began receiving the texts this morning (Jan 16) with a link to redeem. From there, you need to log into...

item.title: X (Twitter) est encore en panne : c’est la deuxième fois en une semaine
item.description: X (Twitter) est en panne. C'est déjà la deuxième fois cette semaine.

item.title: Kathleen Kennedy Says Rian Johnson Was ‘Spooked’ From His ‘Star Wars’ Return
item.description: Speaking as she departs as Lucasfilm president, Kennedy didn't outright confirm Johnson's potential trilogy of films was truly dead—but suggested the 'Last Jedi' backlash pushed the director away for the forseeable future.

item.title: Critical AWS supply chain vulnerability could have let hackers take over key GitHub repositories
item.description: The vulnerability was spotted in August 2025, so users should patch now.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : les PC portables bureautiques et gaming se plient en deux pour proposer les meilleurs prix !
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 ont démarré depuis plus d'une semaine et on trouve de très belles offres, notamment du côté des PC portables. Que vous chercher une machine pour faire tourner vos jeux AAA ou d'un laptop ultrafin et performant pour bosser, vous devriez trouver votre bonheur dans cette sélection.

item.title: Le MacBook Pro avec écran Oled arriverait plus tôt que prévu
item.description: La production des dalles OLED pour les futurs MacBook Pro aurait pris de l'avance, promettant une machine radicalement nouvelle dès cette année.

item.title: 5 income streams you can add to your website right now
item.description: Discover five practical ways to monetize your website using built-in tools from popular website builders like Wix, Hostinger, and WordPress.

item.title: The key to the UK's AI success lies in closing the skills gap
item.description: The UK’s ambition to become a global AI superpower is being stifled by a widening skills gap.

item.title: La crise de la RAM fait bondir les ventes de PC, mais ça ne va clairement pas durer
item.description: L'année 2025 se termine bien pour les revendeurs de PC avec une belle augmentation des ventes.

item.title: I tested the ProtoArc Flexer Pro - a comfortable office chair with lumbar support that's going to be divisive
item.description: A classic ergonomic office chair with a surprisingly comfortable price tag.

item.title: "It does look like a giant donut": IKEA's latest Varmblixt smart light is a viral sensation, but it's not the only show-stopping product coming in 2026
item.description: As discussed on the TechRadar Podcast it's clear that IKEA was the big winner of CES 2026.

item.title: AMD pourrait transformer ses processeurs Ryzen avec cette nouvelle technologie
item.description: AMD prépare peut‑être la prochaine grosse évolution de ses processeurs Ryzen X3D. Un nouveau brevet laisse entendre que la célèbre 3D V‑Cache pourrait aller encore plus loin, avec une hiérarchie de cache repensée pour gagner en puissance et en efficacité.

item.title: Italy investigates Activision Blizzard for pushing in-game purchases
item.description: Italy has launched two investigations into Microsoft's Activision Blizzard, alleging the company has engaged in "misleading and aggressive" sales practices for two of its most popular smartphone games.

item.title: Fuite de données au Service Public : 160 000 documents administratifs ont été piratés, c’est officiel
item.description: Service-public.gouv.fr, le portail pour les démarches administratives en ligne, vient d’être victime d'une fuite de données. Suite à un incident chez un sous-traitant, des identifiants et des documents sensibles ont été compromis.

item.title: This 3D-scanned insole is another example of placebo tech
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. I take my feet seriously. Which […]

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, January 17 (game #1454)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Saturday, January 17 (game #951)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Saturday, January 17 (game #685)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, HBO Max, Disney+ and more this weekend (January 16)
item.description: From the next Game of Thrones show to that divisive Stranger Things docufilm, here's what's worth watching this weekend.

item.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 8 reveals the most distressing gladiator death in the Starz show to date — and its cast 'felt completely shaken' after filming
item.description: The final scene of a Spartacus: House of Ashur episode is always a shocker, but episode 8 is the most deeply upsetting yet... even for its cast.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Why did Apple choose Gemini for next-gen Siri?
item.description: Apple's next-gen Siri is still far off, but this week the company announced that it'll be using Google's Gemini AI for its new foundation models. In this episode, Devindra and Engadget's Igor Bonifacic discuss why Apple teamed up with Google again, instead of OpenAI or Anthropic. Also, they chat about Meta's Reality Lab layoffs, which is refocusing the company on AI hardware like its smart glasses.Subscribe!iTunesSpotifyPocket CastsStitcherGoogle PodcastsTopicsMeta announces 1000+ layoffs, closes 3 VR studios as it shifts focus to AI hardware – 2:12Gemini can now pull context from the rest of ...

item.title: Le prix du Google Pixel 9 Pro XL fond comme neige au soleil pendant les soldes (-40 %)
item.description: C'est une belle affaire des soldes sur Boulanger, pendant laquelle le Google Pixel 9 Pro XL chute à seulement 729 euros alors qu'il en valait 1 199 euros à son lancement en 2024.

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures voitures électriques en 2026 ? Notre comparatif complet
item.description: Les véhicules électriques sont devenus de véritables alternatives aux véhicules thermiques. Que ce soit une citadine, un SUV ou une berline, nous avons choisi les meilleures voitures électriques que la rédaction de Frandroid et de Survoltés ont pu tester.

item.title: China’s Proposed Megaconstellations Would Flood Orbit With 200,000 Satellites
item.description: Around 12,000 satellites are active in orbit today, most of them operated by SpaceX.

item.title: Get $100 off Apple's Mac mini M4 desktop
item.description: The holiday season is fully in the rear view mirror and real life is here to stay. But that doesn't mean the time for gifts is over — especially ones for yourself. You can still take advantage of great January sales on some awesome tech products. Take the Apple Mac mini M4, which is down to $500 from $599. The 17 percent discount gives you 16GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD for only about $20 more than the computer's Black Friday sale. Its beefier models are also on sale: opting for 512GB of SSD will cost you $690, down from $799, while also upping your RAM to 24GB is available for $890, dropping fr...

item.title: Google a une très bonne idée pour prolonger la durée de vie des smartphones pliables
item.description: Google réfléchit à un moyen de rendre les appareils pliables plus faciles à réparer sur un point fondamental.
